ConnectionAliasState.description: The current state of the connection alias, returned as a string.

Associations.description: The association status of the connection alias.

AliasId.description: The identifier of the connection alias, returned as a string.

AssociatedAccountId.description: The identifier of the AWS account that associated the connection alias with a directory.

AssociationStatus.description: The association status of the connection alias.

ConnectionIdentifier.description: The identifier of the connection alias association. You use the connection identifier in the DNS TXT record when you're configuring your DNS routing policies.

ResourceId.description: The identifier of the directory associated with a connection alias.

ConnectionAliasAssociation.description: Describes a connection alias association that is used for cross-Region redirection. For more information, see [Cross-Region Redirection for Amazon WorkSpaces](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/workspaces/latest/adminguide/cross-region-redirection.html) .

description: The `AWS::WorkSpaces::ConnectionAlias` resource specifies a connection alias. Connection aliases are used for cross-Region redirection. For more information, see [Cross-Region Redirection for Amazon WorkSpaces](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/workspaces/latest/adminguide/cross-region-redirection.html) .

ConnectionString.description: The connection string specified for the connection alias. The connection string must be in the form of a fully qualified domain name (FQDN), such as `www.example.com` .

Tags.description: The tags to associate with the connection alias.
